alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:29PM EDT until July 02 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Catoosa County in northwestern Georgia... Central Whitfield County in northwestern Georgia... Central Walker County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Noble, or near Lafayette, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dalton, Ringgold, Chickamauga, Varnell, Tunnel Hill, La Fayette, Noble, Wood Station, Rocky Face, Blue Spring, Mill Creek, Beaumont and Rock Spring. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
